title: My league data size is 8gb  but my freind has to download 14 gb
body:
wtf why ?

i even redownloaded just to see if i get 14gb and i didn't get 14 gb i got like 6gb or so

replies.body: They might have a lot of old files from previous updates.  Once we get to the last phase of the client update, our devs are planning to remove all of these old files on its own.  That would be my assumption on the difference, but the community might also know more over at the [Client ](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion)boards.  Let me know if that clears things up!
